text: I would sometimes get muscle trimmers or
my heart would beat out of rhythm when I
had an electrolyte imbalance so I was my
own guinea pig for a while while I
worked out some of the kinks of the
formula ran into some issues but I'm
still here you know as an engineer was
always fun to experiment and it was
always it was pretty interesting to use
my own body as a development platform it
took a while to find the right
electrolyte balance and I had some
issues in terms of I would sometimes get
muscle tremors or my heart would beat
out of rhythm when I had an electrolyte
imbalance but sort of that out
fortunately I could see things going
wrong when I got something wrong with a
formula but of course for years now
we've had professional food scientists
and nutritionists design and validate
the formula so those days are are in the
past but in the early days I had to be
scrappy and I had to use the tools I had
available so I tested on myself
